mapper.update: update sf_user_share_param set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_user_id = #{fUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, f_user_id, shop_id, sku_id, remark from sf_user_share_param
